sentence.Network_en: Usually the fungus is an ascomycete but occasionally it is a basidiomycete.
sentence.Network_cn: 组成地衣的菌类多为子囊菌,也有担子菌类.

sentence.Network_en: Sterigma ( pl . sterigmata ) A fingerlike projection upon which spores are formed in most basidiomycete fungi.
sentence.Network_cn: 担孢子梗:是大多数担子菌所具有的指状突起结构,其上着生担孢子.

sentence.Network_en: Club - shaped hyphae in the hymenial layer of certain basidiomycete fungi are also termed paraphyses.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些担子菌的子实层中的棒状菌丝也称为侧丝.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 担子菌亚门（basidiomycete）是一群多种多样的真菌，全世界有1100属，16000余种。都是由多细胞的菌丝体组成的有机体，菌丝均 …
basidiomes 子实体, basidiomycete 高等真菌, basidiomycete 羊肚菌
basidiomato 担子菌, basidiomycete 羊肚菌, basidiomes 子实体

list.abs: research progress in precious ectomycorrhizal basidiomycete tricholoma matsutake ., 珍稀共生食用菌松口蘑研究进展.
club-shaped hyphae in the hymenial layer of certain basidiomycete fungi are also termed paraphyses .某些担子菌的子实层中的棒状菌丝也称为侧丝。
effect of basidiomycetes fermentation substance on the metabolism of blood sugar of broiler担子菌发酵产物对肉鸡血糖的影响
small order of basidiomycetous fungi comprising families Nidulariaceae and Sphaerobolaceae ., 担子菌的一个小目 , 由鸟巢菌科和弹球菌科组成.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: Anglicized singular of modern Latin Basidiomycetes, from basidium (see basidium) + Greek mukētes 'fungi'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various fungi of the subdivision Basidiomycota
